title: SPIRITGUARD UDYR SKIN SOUND BUG. [GAMEPLAY]
body: The Spiritguard Udyr skin's taunt sound effect only makes the tiger stance sound effect in all stances.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working to fix it!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Vq9uEaBZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-18T04:08:40.270+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working to fix it!

Any idea when it'll be fixed?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Vq9uEaBZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-18T04:08:40.270+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working to fix it!

ok good to know ty!
